thread.title: Man charged with capital murder in shotgun ambush of woman in Hollywood
thread.title_full: Man charged with capital murder in shotgun ambush of woman in Hollywood

author: Expert
title: Man charged with capital murder in shotgun ambush of woman in Hollywood
text:
US domesticNews Expert 
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) – Los Angeles prosecutors on Tuesday filed capital murder charges against a man accused of using a shotgun to ambush a woman with whom he had a business dispute, shooting her in the head as she walked to dinner near Hollywood’s tourist hub.
